name: 楊安石
objective: 流體力學主要為探討流體運動學與動力學的基礎科目，將講授流體靜力學、流場有限控制體積與微分分析、以及管黏性流原理，進而訓練學生具備數學建模分析流體系統之能力。
schedule:
1 　　Introduction
2　　Fluid Statics
3　　Elementary Fluid Dynamics－Bernoulli Eq.
4　　Fluid Kinematics; Reynolds transport theorem
5　　Finite Control Volume Analysis:
continuity equation
6　　the Newton’s second law－the momentum equation
7　　The first law of thermodynamics－the energy equation (derivation and applications)
8　　Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow:
Conservation of mass
9　　期中考
10　　Conservation of linear and angular momentum;
Equations of motion
11　　Viscous flow: the Navier-Stokes Equations
12　　Solutions of viscous incompressible flows
13　　Viscous Flow in Pipes: laminar flows
14　　Viscous Flow in Pipes: turbulent flows
15　　Viscous Flow in Pipes: entrance/fully developed regions
16　　Moody chart; pipe losses,
17　　Multiple pipe systems; flowrate measurements
18　　期末考
scorePolicy:
1 平時成績：20%（平時出缺席考核與課堂行為觀察，點名缺席一次扣2%，最多扣至20%）
2 期中考：40%
3 期末考：40%
materials:
A Brief Introduction to Fluid Mechanics (4th Edition, John Wiley & Sons),
Authors: D. F. Young, B. R. Munson, and T. H. Okiishi, W. W. Huebsch
